alert.note: Alert for Breckinridge; Butler; Grayson; Hardin; Ohio (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 10:21PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Butler, northwestern Grayson, west central Hardin, southern Breckinridge and east central Ohio Counties through 1045 PM EST/945 PM CST/... At 1021 PM EST/921 PM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Hartford, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Grayson, north central Butler, west central Hardin, east central Ohio and southern Breckinridge Counties, including the following locations... Mcquady, Steff, Se Ree, Shreve, Buras, Flint Springs, Do Stop, Neafus, Dogwalk and Duff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
